category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 18 (Composition and functions of the board of directors)
contents: Article 18 (Composition and functions of the board of directors) ① The board of directors of the city/provincial sports association consists of the chairman, vice-chairman, and directors. ② The board of directors of the city/provincial sports council shall deliberate and decide on the following matters. Revised 2021. 10. 6., 2022. 5. 10. 1. Matters related to business plan and budget 2. Enactment and revision of regulations [Moved from No. 3, previous No. 2 deleted 2017. 3. 23.] 3 Matters pertaining to the incorporation of basic assets 4. Matters pertaining to the establishment and operation of various committees 5. Consent on the appointment and dismissal of the Secretary General 6. Matters delegated at the general meeting 7. Matters pertaining to the submission of agenda to the general meeting 8. Approval of membership of associate member organizations and recognized organizations. , Demotion and expulsion 9. Other important matters Revised May 10, 2022 ③ Deleted March 23, 2017
